distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libtasn1 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-46848: Fixed off-by-one array size check that affects asn1_encode_simple_der (bsc#1204690).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: GNU Libtasn1 before 4.19.0 has an ETYPE_OK off-by-one array size check that affects asn1_encode_simple_der.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
